Lyric:
[00:06.94]You ready? Let's go!

[00:15.35]Yeah, for those of you that

[00:19.47]want to know what we're all about

[00:21.27]It's like this y'all (c'mon!)

[00:22.71]This is ten percent luck

[00:24.45]Twenty percent skill

[00:25.73]Fifteen percent concentrated power of will

[00:28.49]Five percent pleasure

[00:29.69]Fifty percent pain

[00:30.82]And a hundred percent reason to remember the name

[00:33.86]Mike

[00:34.94]He doesn't need his name up in lights

[00:36.31]He just wants to be heard whether it's the beat or the mic

[00:39.30]He feels so unlike everybody else, alone

[00:42.34]In spite of the fact that some people

[00:44.46]still think that they know him

[00:45.16]But fuck em'

[00:46.14]He knows the code

[00:47.15]It's not about the salary

[00:48.25]It's all about reality and makin' some noise

[00:50.63]Makin' the story

[00:51.85]Makin' sure his clique stays up

[00:53.49]That means when he puts it down Tak's pickin' it up(Let's go!)

[00:56.82]Who the hell is he anyway?

[00:58.16]He never really talks much

[00:59.68]Never concerned with status but still leavin' them star struck

[01:02.19]Humbled through opportunities given to him despite the fact

[01:05.00]That many misjudge him because he makes a livin' from writin raps

[01:08.10]Put it together himself, now the picture connects

[01:10.48]Never askin for someone's help, to get some respect

[01:13.06]He's only focused on what he wrote, his will is beyond reach

[01:16.52]And now when it all unfolds, the skill of an artist

[01:19.42]This is twenty percent skill

[01:20.63]Eighty percent fear

[01:21.72]Be a hundred percent clear 'cause Ryu is ill

[01:24.52]Who would've thought that he'd be the one to set the west in flames

[01:27.69]And I heard him wreckin' with The Crystal Method,Name Of The Game

[01:30.34]Came back dropped Megadef, took 'em to church

[01:33.05]I like 'bleach, man, why you have the stupidest verse?

[01:35.94]This dude is the truth, now everybody be givin' him guest spots

[01:39.27]His stock's through the roof I heard he fuckin' with S-Dot!

[01:41.81]This is ten percent luck

[01:43.34]Twenty percent skill

[01:44.78]Fifteen percent concentrated power of will

[01:47.26]Five percent pleasure

[01:49.02]Fifty percent pain

[01:50.34]And a hundred percent reason to remember the name

[01:52.95]They call him Ryu, he’s sick

[01:54.29]And he’s spittin fire with Mike

[01:55.76]Got him out the dryer he's hot

[01:57.04]Found him in Fort Minor with Tak

[01:58.49]What a fuckin’ nihilist porcupine

[02:00.27]He's a prick, he's a cock

[02:01.35]The type women want to be with

[02:02.99]And rappers hope he get shot

[02:04.43]Eight years in the makin'

[02:05.74]Patiently waitin to blow

[02:07.19]Now the record with Shinoda's takin' over the globe

[02:09.86]He's got a partner in crime his shit is equally dope

[02:12.20]You won't believe the kind of shit that comes out of this kid's throat

[02:16.14]Tak

[02:17.14]He's not your everyday on the block

[02:18.35]He knows how to work with what he's got

[02:20.09]Makin' his way to the top

[02:21.32]He often gets a comment on his name

[02:22.94]People keep askin him was it given at birth

[02:25.35]Or does it stand for an acronym?

[02:26.97]No, he's livin' proof

[02:28.50]Got him rockin' the booth

[02:29.54]He'll get you buzzin' quicker than a shot of vodka with juice

[02:32.67]Him and his crew are known around as one of the best

[02:35.45]Dedicated to what they do and give a hundred percent

[02:38.44]Forget Mike

[02:39.07]Nobody really knows how or why he works so hard

[02:42.16]It seems like he's never got time

[02:43.81]Because he writes every note and he writes every line

[02:46.54]And I've seen him at work when that light goes on in his mind

[02:49.27]It’s like a design is written in his head every time

[02:52.05]Before he even touches a key or speaks in a rhyme

[02:54.95]And those motherfuckers he runs with, those kids that he signed

[02:58.31]Ridiculous, without even tryin', how do they do it?

[03:00.98]This is ten percent luck

[03:02.24]Twenty percent skill

[03:03.62]Fifteen percent concentrated power of will

[03:06.65]Five percent pleasure

[03:08.12]Fifty percent pain

[03:09.40]And a hundred percent reason to remember the name

[03:12.39]This is ten percent luck

[03:13.68]Twenty percent skill

[03:15.13]Fifteen percent concentrated power of will

[03:17.94]Five percent pleasure

[03:19.13]Fifty percent pain

[03:20.78]And a hundred percent reason to remember the name

[03:23.40]Yeah

[03:25.01]Fort Minor, M. Shinoda

[03:27.30]Styles of Beyond

[03:30.50]Ryu, Takbir

[03:33.59]Machine Shop
